item.title: Jasper’s Wheel Pack v3.1 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 1, 2025

Jasper’s Wheel Pack v3.1 1.53 ETS2

Change Log v3.1
Fixed volvo / renault HUB crash.
Fixed normals of Daf’s cover.
Fixed UVMapping of Alcoa Dura Bright.
Added Jasper’s Improved Brightness.scs file (above Jasper’s Wheels Pack v3.1)

Features:
This realistic wheels pack was made from zero with a lot of care and quality control. It combines realistic 3D models with great performance, this means that anyone, no matter how good your computer is, will be able to run it without problems!

You will find tons of options that float between Alcoas, Maxion and even a custom-made European Style. With a lot of possible combinations between then

Credits: Jasper

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Project M12 Vostok v2.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 1, 2025

Project M12 Vostok v2.0 ETS2

Changes 2.0
– Adaptation to the latest version of the game
– Adding new, own objects!
– Optimization work has been carried out
– Fixing bugs, errors found during the work
– Adding the Melenki-Murom track
– Connection to the PROJECT RUSSIA 5.6.2 card, I attach a link – (dsc.gg/project-russia)
– Implementation of a new section of the M12 from the interchange to Nizhny Novgorod to Shumerlya
– Part of the roads in Chuvashia
– Alteration of the roads of the M7 highway along with part of the bypass of Vladimir
– Not most of the R-132 highway
– Rebuilding of the M12 to the interchange on Drachevo, Butylitsy
– Added cities: Vladimir, Shumerlya. Without registration-Turgenevo

Map for version 1.53
Installation procedure: Put above the maps of Siberia, the South, Kirov and Nnmap, Project Russia 5.6.2

Credits: Twirk

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v25.00 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 1, 2025

Sound Fixes Pack v25.00 ATS

CHANGELOG v25.00
Simplified fallback default city ambience, resulting in less noticeably repetitive looped sounds and more efficient usage of memory.
Engine and horn sounds added to the 2007 Dennis Dagger in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
Engine and horn sounds added to the civilian 2013 Renault Captur (J87 generation) in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
Engine and horn sounds added to the police 2013 Renault Captur (J87 generation) in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]
Engine and horn sounds added to the 2016 Dacia Sandero II (B52 generation, post-facelift) in AI traffic. [ETS2 edition]

Optional addon news
Previous soundproofing for ETS2 updated with soundproofing for the 2021 Volvo FH Series 5 and the 2024 Volvo FH Series 6.

DESCRIPTION
This mod has been bringing more immersion to common sounds in the game for over 9 years!
It packs a variety of sound content within one mod, making it great value within the 100 mod limit in Convoy multiplayer.

COMPATIBILITY

* ETS2 1.53.3 + ATS 1.53.2. No errors in game log. Must have high priority in Mod Manager.
* Does not replace individual player truck sounds, so this mod can be used with an unlimited amount of truck sound mods of your choice.
* Compatible with all maps and all trucks, including truck mods.
* Supported in single-player and multiplayer Convoy mode, and is marked as an optional mod in Convoy.

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
Requires higher priority in Mod Manager than:
– any map mods (e.g. ProMods)
– any AI traffic mods (e.g. traffic packs and traffic pack add-ons)
– any rain sound mods

FEATURE LIST
The mod features meticulously crafted sounds, covering the following:

– Suspension and tire bump sounds for your truck and trailer.
– Fuel / filling station sounds.
– Door close and seatbelt sounds after refueling.
– Train sound enhancements for several locomotives and railroad cars.
– Country/state specific railroad crossing bell sounds.
– The most complete tire sound package for all terrains: asphalt, gravel, grass, snow, and sleeper lines.
– Wet tire sound for the player’s truck tires when the asphalt roads are wet.
– Reworked tire screech/skid sound effects.
– Nokia phone ringtone sound replacing the hurry up / late music, leading to less stress for the player.
– Default common sound reworks, such as improved default air brake sounds.
– AI traffic vehicle sound improvements, with engine and horn sounds uniquely set for specific vehicles.
– English AU/UK/US voice navigation variants with speaker effect added and uncustomary phrases removed.
– Wind buffeting and rush of air sounds at high speeds only when the window is open.
– More environmental and ambient sounds, and tasteful changes to existing ambient sounds in the game world.
– Trailer coupling, trailer brace rotation, and trailer sliding axle sounds.
– 5 standalone air horns.
– Dynamic rain sounds, and an assortment of different thunder sounds with delay.
– Default gear grinding sound effect additions and improvements.
– Stronger reverb effects when under bridges and overpasses.
– (ATS only) Drawbridge lift warning sound for the Columbia River Interstate Bridge.
– (ATS only) Working sounds for the Musical Road on the Historic Route 66.
– (Optional) Reefer / refrigerated trailer sound functionality.
– (Optional – ATS only) Cop scouting reports via CB radio (enable in voice navigation options).
– Fixes for World Ambient sound glitches from the vanilla game and/or mods.

For further immersion, the mod may also include official paint colors and more authentic specifications for each AI traffic vehicle it modifies for sound. Rarer paint colors are less likely to be seen.

Credits: SCS Software, Drive Safely, antonvezdehod, Darkcaptain, Frontiersman, Grinch, Katixa, Kriechbaum, Max2712, Trayscapes, Vasily (Engine Voice Records), Zeemod

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Steam Inventory Unlock v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | January 1, 2025

Steam Inventory Unlock v1.0 ETS2

For only SCS trucks and trailers.
With this mod you get full access to Steam inventory. Not be added to your Steam account!
The mod will be updated as SCS adds new vehicles/trailers and after SCS events (if item reward).

CHANGELOGS:
Added “Cruising Greece” & “Return to Winterland Event 2024” item rewards.
Added New Trucks: Iveco Sway, Volvo FH Series 5 & Volvo FH Series 6
Fixed: Desktop Background: “On Top of The World” and minor fixes.

Happy New Year & Happy Trucking!
YESILCINAR

Tested: 1.53
Ver: 2025_1

NEW ITEMS:
Paint Job: “Midnight Dolphin”
Cabin Accessory: “Donkey”, “Little Owl”, “Decorative Cab Lights Assortment”, “Christmas Hat and Mittens”, “Marigold’s Chocolates”, “Festive Gingerbread Stamps”, “White Deer”, “Christmas Bells”

CONTENTS* : 8 PIECE DESKTOP BACKGROUNDS, 21 PIECE PAINT JOBS, 135 PIECE CABIN ACCESSORIES
*: Details in file

Credits: YESILCINAR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
